style="margin-top:56px;margin-bottom:0px;background:rgb(249,249,249);color:rgb(36,36,36);font-family:'source-code-pro', Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', Courier, monospace;padding:32px;border:1px solid class="pw-post-body-paragraph lh li fp lj b lk ll lm ln lo lp lq lr ls lt lu lv lw lx ly lz ma mb mc md me fi bj" style="margin:2.14em 0px added correctly. We can then install PHP7.4 which can be done using the below command.</p><pre class="mf mg mh mi mj mk ml mm bo mn ba bj" style="margin-top:56px;margin-bottom:0px;background:rgb(249,249,249);color:rgb(36,36,36);font-family:'source-code-pro', Menlo, Monaco, 'Courier New', Courier, monospace;padding:32px;border:1px solid rgb(229,229,229);"><span class="mo mp fp ml b bf mq mr l ms mt" style="line-height:1.4;letter-spacing:-0.022em;margin-top:-0.2em;margin-bottom:-0.2em;">brew install shivammathur/php/php@7.4</span></pre><p class="pw-post-body-paragraph lh li fp lj b lk ll lm ln lo lp lq lr ls lt lu lv lw lx ly lz ma mb mc md me fi bj" style="margin:2.14em 0px -0.46em;color:rgb(36,36,36);line-height:32px;letter-spacing:-0.003em;font-family:'source-serif-pro', Georgia, Cambria, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;font-size:20px;">Third, once the above command ran successfully. rgb(229,229,229);"><span class="mo mp fp ml b bf mq mr l ms mt" style="line-height:1.4;letter-spacing:-0.022em;margin-top:-0.2em;margin-bottom:-0.2em;">brew install
